entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:03 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening then becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
